Name: Budget Cap
Description: Project spend must not exceed allocated budget

Name: Team Size Range
Description: Team must have between 3 and 9 members

Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Fixed sprint length must be 1 to 4 weeks

Name: Skill Coverage
Description: Every user story must be assigned to team with required skills

Name: Resource Availability
Description: Workers must not be overbooked beyond availability

Name: Backlog Order
Description: Features must follow priority order in backlog

Name: Deployment Window
Description: Deployments only in approved time windows

Name: Meeting Cadence
Description: Daily Scrum must occur every workday

Name: Review Attendance
Description: At least 70% stakeholders must attend reviews

Name: Retrospective Actions
Description: All open retrospection actions must be closed next sprint
